table.name: vtiger_businessactions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessactions` ( `businessactionsid` int(11) default NULL, `businessactions_no` varchar(56) default NULL, `businessactionsname` varchar(255) default NULL, `reference` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_status` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` text, `template` text, `tags` text, `moduleactions` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `businessrules_action` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `elementtype_action` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `actions_block` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `script_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `parameter1` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `linktomapmodule` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `linktobrules` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `causale` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `stockparameters` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sequencers` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `output_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `threshold` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `budymessage` text, `crontab` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `iomap` varchar(100) default null, PRIMARY KEY (`businessactionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_businessactionscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_businessactionscf` ( `businessactionsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`businessactionsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
